name: edgemealsoftware
short_description:
Freeware for Windows XP


CPU Affinity Programs - Set CPU Affinity and Priority of files manually or automatically. (Multi-Core CPUs)

CPU Usage in Tray - Display CPU usage in system tray for single and multi-core CPUs.

AMD64 Calculator v1.0.08 (65 KB - Jan 10th, 2007) Screen Shot
Calculator to figure CPU, HT and Ram speeds on AMD socket 939 system.
